abilityEffect.en: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Ampharos is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: You may discard all [L] Energy attached to Ampharos. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.
